data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Palamu, Jharkhand, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Palamu, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Palamu, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Palamu against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 21,339 believers in Palamu and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Sauntia people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Sauntia people know you.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Palamu unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Palamu, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Palamu, Jharkhand, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Palamu
location.people_groups_list: Kawar, Korwa, Agariya (Hindu traditions), Panika, Nagarchi (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kawar (984,000), Korwa (448,000), Agariya (Hindu traditions) (205,000), Panika (1,050,000), Nagarchi (Hindu traditions) (149,000)
